column1: Manufacturing Engineering via Study Centres MSc
column5: Manufacturing Engineers are creative innovators that revolutionise the way we live and are highly skilled in research, design, technology, processes and equipment. This course is designed for graduates who would like to develop a rewarding and well-paid career in engineering. Industry-relevant modules such as Design for Manufacturing and Manufacturing Automation mean youâ€™ll be well-prepared for employment in the sector.Contact the Study Centre directly for information on fees and start dates.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time
